Radhika Apte Looks Stunning In These Pictures And We Have Proof
Radhika Apte Looks Stunning In These Pictures And We Have Proof
Radhika Apte is one of the few actresses in Bollywood who has been part of hit films consistently of late. She first featured in a Bollywood film in 2005 with a brief role in Vaah! Life Ho Toh Aisi. Since then, she has worked in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Bengali, and Marathi-language films. Her roles in 2015 Bollywood movies Badlapur, Hunterrr and the biographical film Manjhi - The Mountain Man, garnered her immense praise.
Phobia and Parched (both 2016) gave her the platform to showcase her acting prowess. She was also a part of Netflix productions namely Lust Stories, thriller series Sacred Games and Ghoul. Her role in the Hindi biographical film Pad Man (2018) and the Hindi black comedy Andhadhun (2018) brought her immense praise from all quarters of the industry and fans alike.

title: Radhika Apte Looks Stunning In These Pictures And We Have Proof
description: Radhika Apte is an Indian theater and film actress. Born in Vellore, Tamil Nadu. Apte began acting in theatre productions before venturing into films. She made her feature film debut with a brief role in the Hindi fantasy Vaah! Life Ho Toh Aisi!. Apte has since worked in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Bengali, and Marathi-language films.
